actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To increase the amount of deduction for health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.

summary.text: Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions relating to the income tax deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals to: (1) increase from 25 percent to 100 percent the allowable deduction; and (2) remove the prohibition on taking such deduction into account for self-employment tax purposes.

titles.title: To increase the amount of deduction for health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.
